org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.hooks

Interface Hook

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExecuteWithHookContext, HiveDriverRunHook, HiveSemanticAnalyzerHook, HiveSessionHook, QueryLifeTimeHook, QueryLifeTimeHookWithParseHooks
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSemanticAnalyzerHook, ATSHook, DisallowTransformHook, DriverTestHook, EnforceReadOnlyTables, HCatSemanticAnalyzer, HCatSemanticAnalyzerBase, HiveProtoLoggingHook, LineageLogger, MaterializedViewRegistryPropertiesHook, MetricsQueryLifeTimeHook, NoOperatorReuseCheckerHook, OperatorStatsReaderHook, PostExecOrcFileDump, PostExecOrcRowGroupCountPrinter, PostExecTezSummaryPrinter, PostExecutePrinter, PostExecWMEventsSummaryPrinter, PreExecutePrinter, Redactor, RuntimeStatsPersistenceCheckerHook, UpdateInputAccessTimeHook.PreExec

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
 @InterfaceStability.Stable
public interface Hook
    The new interface for all the pre execute hooks and post execute hooks
